local_intent: Ensure T-block is visible, detect it, approach and align precisely, set yaw to 90 deg, and verify orientation.
assumptions: t_block is a valid target handle
Yaw verification via AtOrientation suffices to confirm readiness for the push
coherence_with_global: Replicates global perception fallback with retry, then DetectObject and ApproachAndAlign matching LOCAL_ANNOTATION. Sets yaw to 90 and verifies orientation to prepare for the subsequent push, consistent with GLOBAL_BT and description.
